basics.name: Chris Pelatari
basics.label: Blue Fenix Productions
basics.summary: I'm an experienced software developer with over 2 decades of crafting full-stack web and desktop applications using dotnet technologies including C# and VB.NET. Lately, I've been diving into TypeScript and Node.js, often paired with an ASP.NET Core backend. I'm also proud to be a former Microsoft MVP and a member of the AspInsiders community.
